title: Asian Traders Drive Bitcoin's 16% Rally While West Takes Profits
summary: Bitcoin's recent 16% rally was predominantly driven by Asian trading hours (+25% contribution), while European (-6%) and US traders (-3%) took profits. Similar patterns emerged in Ethereum with 63% gains almost entirely from Asian sessions (+96%).

title: Leveraged Crypto Positions Surge as Funding Rates Hit Critical Levels
summary: Open interest surged $6B for Bitcoin, $8B for Ethereum, and $2.2B for Solana over two weeks starting July 9. Funding rates climbed to 19%, 13%, and 18% respectively, reaching 92nd, 71st, and 81st historical percentiles, signaling potential unwinding risk.
